title: Photograph, Huicol Indians: Woman of Las Hausimas, Nayarit, Mexico, 1940–41
title_raw: Huicol Indians: Woman of Las Hausimas, Nayarit, Mexico
medium: Gelatin silver print mounted on cream paperboard, ruled lines in pen and black ink
signed: Recto of photograph: lower right in pen and black ink: Donald Corday
inscribed:
Recto lower left in pen and black ink: Huicol Indians: / Woman of Las Hausimas, Nayarit, Mexico - / She is embroidering a small, man's bag: her face is painted vermillion.

Verso in graphite lower right: For Ellimon pouch
Verso in graphite lower right:  326.1d

verso: old accession number: 1949-109-1-A
description:
Woman embroidering a small bag.
[SEE CURATORIAL REMARKS]
